title: Sagittarius’ Luckiest Numbers, Days, & More (Plus How to Use Them)

steps.title: 3 can bring Sagittarius good fortune and prosperity.
steps.content: 3 can bring Sagittarius good fortune and prosperity. Luck comes naturally to optimistic Sagittarians, but you can always use an extra boost! So, work with 3 to bring positivity and abundance into your personal and professional life. Buy 3 lottery tickets to win the jackpot, schedule job interviews at 3:00, or plan dates on the 3rd or 30th of each month. [1] X Research source Use 3 when you play the lottery to increase your chances of winning! Selecting numbers that add up to 3, like 12 and 21, as well as multiples of 3 like 6, 9, and 15, also helps improve your luck.

steps.title: 9 can deepen Sagittarius’ intelligence and awareness.
steps.content: 9 can deepen Sagittarius’ intelligence and awareness. As a curious and philosophical Sagittarius, your thirst for knowledge is unquenchable. Seeing number 9 is a sign that new revelations about yourself and the world are near. You might meditate for 9 minutes each day to connect with your spirituality and reach higher levels of awareness or read 9 books about a subject that intrigues you. [2] X Research source

steps.title: 6 can bring Sagittarius balance.
steps.content: 6 can bring Sagittarius balance. In numerology, 6 represents harmony, empathy, love, and support. With the bold personality of a fire sign and your nomadic spirit, you are always jumping into something new, so you can forget to slow down. Spotting 6 can be a reminder to practice self-care , lean on your friends for support, and take a breather every once in a while. [3] X Research source For instance, end your evening with a 6-step bedtime routine to calm down. Or, make plans to hang out with your friends at 6:00 to feel their love and encouragement.

steps.title: 5 can bring Sagittarius more adventures.
steps.content: 5 can bring Sagittarius more adventures. As a mutable sign who loves change, exploring new horizons, meeting new people, and trying new things are what gets you out of bed each morning. Being the number of freedom and change, 5 encourages you to switch careers, plan an international trip, or go on first dates to expand your mind and continue growing into the best version of yourself. [4] X Research source For example, if you spot cheap flights on the 5th of the month, that might be your sign to book a much-needed vacation. Or, if someone you’re interested in asks you on a date at 5:00, take it as a sign that the date might lead to a blossoming romance.

steps.title: 8 can help Sagittarius achieve success in their career.
steps.content: 8 can help Sagittarius achieve success in their career. While your ambitious nature and optimistic outlook help you reach new heights in your career, it’s totally normal to experience setbacks every once in a while. 8 is a powerful lucky number for Sagittarius that reminds you that you have the strength to keep going and the skills to face challenges head-on. [5] X Research source Use 8 to keep yourself motivated when issues come up at work. You might break up a problem into 8 chunks to make it easier to solve or take an 8-minute break every hour to relax and recharge.

steps.title: Thursday is the luckiest day for Sagittarius.
steps.content: Thursday is the luckiest day for Sagittarius. Jupiter, the planet of luck, success, and wisdom, rules over both Sagittarius and Thursdays. This makes Thursday incredibly auspicious for the archer. If you need a little boost of good fortune in your personal or professional life, plan important events on Thursdays. [6] X Research source For instance, buy lottery tickets on Thursdays to improve your odds of winning, schedule work meetings to ensure projects roll out smoothly, or plan dates to increase your chances of meeting The One. Thursdays that fall on dates with your lucky numbers, like the 3rd, 5th, 6th, 8th, and 9th, are very auspicious and boost your luck even more. Sagittarians are also especially lucky between 3 and 9 a.m. as well as 3 and 9 p.m. These are great times to plan flights or work on tough projects.

steps.title: Purple and blue are lucky colors for Sagittarius.
steps.content: Purple and blue are lucky colors for Sagittarius. Purple is the perfect color for passionate Sagittarius. This royal hue represents intelligence and enlightenment, encouraging you to get curious, push the boundaries, and reach higher levels of consciousness. [7] X Research source Blue is associated with wisdom as well as luck, helping you develop your intuition to make good decisions that bring you prosperity. [8] X Research source Orange is also associated with Sagittarius. This warm, happy color reflects your boundless positivity and helps you harness your self-confidence to achieve your dreams. [9] X Research source Feel the good luck of your colors by adding purple pillows on your couch, painting your room blue, or wearing orange clothes to work.

steps.title: Turquoise
steps.content: Turquoise As the December birthstone for Sagittarius, turquoise brings you balance and peace. Whether you’re worn out from traveling or feeling burnt out at work, wearing turquoise jewelry or simply holding this stone after a long day can help you destress and calm down. [10] X Research source Turquoise is also believed to protect you from negative energy. If you have a big presentation at work or you’re feeling nervous before a date, wearing turquoise can help you feel more positive.

steps.title: Topaz
steps.content: Topaz Both yellow and blue topaz boost Sagittarius’ best qualities. Yellow topaz represents confidence and wealth, helping you take risks in your career to secure raises and promotions. Blue topaz is associated with honesty and communication. It can help you gain clarity about your life’s purpose and speak confidently to achieve success. [11] X Research source Wear a blue topaz necklace to open your throat chakra and express yourself with tact and certainty. Put on yellow topaz jewelry or hold a gem to feel its powerful, confident qualities and help open your solar plexus chakra .

steps.title: Amethyst
steps.content: Amethyst With purple being one of Sagittarius’ lucky colors, it’s no surprise this violet gem brings you good fortune. Amethyst signifies spiritual awareness and wisdom which taps into your philosophical nature. Wearing amethyst jewelry or carrying this stone might deepen your intuition, boost your spiritual awareness, and show you important truths about yourself. Meditate with amethyst to strengthen its properties, open your crown chakra , and deepen your spirituality.

steps.title: A, M, L, and Y are the luckiest letters for Sagittarius.
steps.content: A, M, L, and Y are the luckiest letters for Sagittarius. Keep an eye out for these lucky letters of the alphabet when you make travel plans, go on dates, and apply for jobs. A, M, L, or Y are very fortunate for you and might be the first letter of the next city you visit, the name of your soulmate, or the company where you make it big.
